member.name: T:Bridge.Pixi.ParticleContainer
member.summary: The ParticleContainer class is a really fast version of the Container built solely for speed, so use when you need a lot of sprites or particles. The tradeoff of the ParticleContainer is that advanced functionality will not work. ParticleContainer implements only the basic object transform (position, scale, rotation). Any other functionality like tinting, masking, etc will not work on sprites in this batch.

member.param: The maximum number of particles that can be renderer by the container.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.IRenderer.ClearBeforeRender
member.summary: This sets if the CanvasRenderer will clear the canvas or not before the new render pass. If the scene is NOT transparent Pixi will use a canvas sized FillRect operation every frame to set the canvas background color. If the scene is transparent Pixi will use ClearRect to clear the canvas every frame. Disable this by setting this to false. For example if your game has a canvas filling background image you often don't need this set.

member.name: T:Bridge.Pixi.Filters.ConvolutionFilter
member.summary: The ConvolutionFilter class applies a matrix convolution filter effect.A convolution combines pixels in the input image with neighboring pixels to produce a new image. A wide variety of image effects can be achieved through convolutions, including blurring, edge detection, sharpening, embossing, and beveling. The matrix should be specified as a 9 point Array. See http://docs.gimp.org/en/plug-in-convmatrix.html for more info.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.SystemRenderer.ClearBeforeRender
member.summary: This sets if the CanvasRenderer will clear the canvas or not before the new render pass. If the scene is NOT transparent Pixi will use a canvas sized FillRect operation every frame to set the canvas background color. If the scene is transparent Pixi will use ClearRect to clear the canvas every frame. Disable this by setting this to false. For example if your game has a canvas filling background image you often don't need this set.

member.summary: The WebGLRenderer draws the scene and all its content onto a WebGL enabled canvas. This renderer should be used for browsers that support WebGL. This Render works by automatically managing WebGLBatches, so no need for Sprite Batches or Sprite Clouds. Don't forget to add the view to your DOM or you will not see anything :)

member.name: T:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker
member.summary: A Ticker class that runs an update loop that other objects listen to. This class is composed around an EventEmitter object to add listeners meant for execution on the next requested animation frame. Animation frames are requested only when necessary, e.g. When the ticker is started and the emitter has listeners.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.AutoStart
member.summary: Whether or not this ticker should invoke the method Start automatically when a listener is added.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.DeltaTime
member.summary: Scalar time value from last frame to this frame. This value is capped by setting MinFPS and is scaled with Speed. Note: The cap may be exceeded by scaling.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Elapsed
member.summary: Time elapsed in milliseconds from last frame to this frame. Opposed to what the DeltaTime is based, this value is neither capped nor scaled. If the platform supports DOMHighResTimeStamp, this value will have a precision of 1 s.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.FPS
member.summary: The frames per second at which this ticker is running. The default is approximately 60 in most modern browsers. Note: This does not factor in the value of Speed, which is specific to scaling DeltaTime.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.LastTime
member.summary: The last time Update was invoked. This value is also reset internally outside of invoking update, but only when a new animation frame is requested. If the platform supports DOMHighResTimeStamp, this value will have a precision of 1 s.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.MinFPS
member.summary: Manages the maximum amount of milliseconds allowed to elapse between invoking Update. This value is used to cap DeltaTime, but does not effect the measured value of FPS. When setting this property it is clamped to a value between 0 and Pixi.TargetFPMS * 1000.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Speed
member.summary: Factor of DeltaTime.

member.name: P:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Started
member.summary: Whether or not this ticker has been started. True if Start has been called. False if Stop has been called. While false, this value may change to true in the event of AutoStart being true and a listener is added.

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Add(Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.UpdateDelegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls module:eventemitter3.EventEmitter#on internally for the internal 'tick' event. It checks if the emitter has listeners, and if so it requests a new animation frame at this point.
member.param: The listener function to be added for updates.
The listener context.
member.returns: This.

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.AddOnce(Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.UpdateDelegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls module:eventemitter3.EventEmitter#once internally for the internal 'tick' event. It checks if the emitter has listeners, and if so it requests a new animation frame at this point.
member.param: The listener function to be added for one update.
The listener context.
member.returns: this

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Remove(Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.UpdateDelegate,System.Object)
member.summary: Calls module:eventemitter3.EventEmitter#off internally for 'tick' event. It checks if the emitter has listeners for 'tick' event. If it does, then it cancels the animation frame.
member.param: The listener function to be removed.
The listener context to be removed.
member.returns: this

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Start
member.summary: Starts the ticker. If the ticker has listeners a new animation frame is requested at this point.

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Stop
member.summary: Stops the ticker. If the ticker has requested an animation frame it is canceled at this point.

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Update
member.summary: Triggers an update. An update entails setting the current Elapsed, the current DeltaTime, invoking all listeners with current DeltaTime, and then finally setting LastTime with the value of CurrentTime that was provided. This method will be called automatically by animation frame callbacks if the ticker instance has been started and listeners are added.

member.name: M:Bridge.Pixi.Ticker.Ticker.Update(System.Single)
member.summary: Triggers an update. An update entails setting the current Elapsed, the current DeltaTime, invoking all listeners with current DeltaTime, and then finally setting LastTime with the value of CurrentTime that was provided. This method will be called automatically by animation frame callbacks if the ticker instance has been started and listeners are added.
member.param: The current time of execution.
